caption: Couple of things: First of all this is the best pizza in the capital region from an Italian perspective. The dough coming out of the wood fire oven is unbelievable and the recipes are quite simple as they should be. The garlic bulb is also …

Not bad at all. Good pizza but unfortunately Troy NY is the capital districts mecca of pizza so they are not in the rankings. Definetely a must try as bipolar as this review is sounding. Lol. Very friendly waiter. My only complaint is I am a domestic beer guy and Utica Club was the only thing that wasn't a craft beer
The best wood fired pizza in the capitol district. Great place to eat!
Great wood-fired pizza!
One of the best pizzas in town offering single-serve portions

It was okay I’ve had better and definitely overpriced for the tiny pizza I got when I ordered a large. I got the Buffalo chicken pizza with tax 18.50 and some pieces of the pizza didn’t even have chicken on them others just had one large …
Pretty cool place, loved the live fire oven construction for the pizzas. Great spot..
Italian food at this place - super good. I love going here.
Excellent food. Quality not comprised. You will not be disappointed.

Fav new spot. Came here for the first time on a whim this past Friday and my expectations, which were simply to have some good pizza and wine, were highly exceeded. My friend and I shared the garlic parm wings and the mozzabella pizza, …

Food was excellent,  the roasted garlic bulb app with bread was out of this world,  the fired not fried wings were yum and of course the pizza was great. Service was maybe a bit off and they seemed thrown by us having a party of 8 at one …
Wonderful place in Downtown Troy!!
Been coming here for years. Love the food and the atmosphere.
Great food and great atmosphere!
Went here on a whim while in the area. Pizza was excellent, especially the pizza dough. The pasta with house-made sausage was delicious as well. Great, friendly service.
Great atmosphere, great staff, and great pizza.
Really cool cozy atmosphere. Wings were incredible. Better than anything I've ever had fried. The pizza was likewise amazing. Perfect wood fired crust. Will 100% be coming back.
Excellent food and service.

After reading some reviews I decided to try this restaurant during a trip to Troy. My friend and I ordered a large pizza and bowl of pasta to share. The pizza had fresh mozzarella, spinach, and meatballs. It was very tasty and the crust was …
This place is great...Ambiance and great food too!!!!

Great place. Dim lit. Amazing pizza made right in front of you. They have a good selection and unique sauces, for example I ordered peach habanero wing which were amazing and I could taste the sweetness of the peach without the habanero completely masking it. Recommended for sure
Very good word fired pizza. Cozy atmosphere in the basement of a brown stone.
A nice place to grab a bite to eat and a few beers. Bartenders seemed to be unhappy and unsocial.
Excellent food and service!   Love it
Order food showed up
(Translated by Google) Excellent cider  (Original) Sidra excelente
Like the location and the indoor/outdoor seating. Pizza is okay, pasta is disappointing. Usually a pretty good beer list.
A good spot for a good drink and some friends
Super cute and cozy place with good food at decent prices and friendly staff!
Omg it was so so good. The wings were the best and my friend's pasta dish was really yummy. Best pizza I've ever had!!

Went in on a Saturday night prime time. Smoked wings were fabulous. Pizza was burnt, dry, and laughably disproportionate. It was 80% burnt crust, 20% cheese and topping. If you're only going to have 2 entrees on your menu (pizza and pasta), …

Overall, a great experience. Pizza was well done, authentic and great selection of beers. The critique about bubbles in the crust is to be ignored as being a pizza maker myself bubbles in crust are a sign of good yeast. There were  at least …
Stood in line for a table for 20 minutes with my name on a list then refused service because "I'm not going to sit only one person at a table on a show night." Never going back.

The pizza was delicious, bet selection was great and the staff was incredibly friendly. This was a nice little find while it walking through Troy when there was a wait at another restaurant we were going to. We say outdoors in a nice …
My husband and I love this place. Our favorite date night spot!

Good food. Located in the heart of Downtown Troy. A great place to relax have wine and dine. I went during the evening on a Friday. There wasn’t that many people, so it was easy to grab a seat. You have the option of sitting inside or …
Scrumptious, loved the fire cooked pizza, wings were delicious! The ambiance and chefs were sweet, definitely a must try on your list💕
Great Pizza....
Great pizza and a neat atmosphere.
Great atmosphere,  good food!
Great food, friendly service!!!
Love the garlic bread especially. But the staff are always so kind too.
Great pizza/pasta joint with a really nice vibe. Chef and the staff are great and entertaining. Did was really quite good.  Certainly enjoyed the spicy Diablo pasta dish (and it was very spicy).
Excellent food
Longish wait but amazing food and beautiful atmosphere!
Cool spot. Nice Bartender. I went with the margarita pizza. Yummy
Love wood fired pizza
Ordered small pizza ( 4 as slices ) with peppers and onions. Cost me $10 got 2 pieces of pepper and 2 pieces of onion and the dough was raw in the middle. Never again!
IT WAS A WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE WE LOVED THEIR PIZZA. & WENT BACK AGAIN AND WILL AGAIN ❗
Food and good beer selection.
Awesome quiet little hole in the wall with great beer selection and friendly staff.  Best neopolitan pizza around.
Pizza was good but service was not so great..food arrived pretty much room temperature. Had an empty glass way too long
This is one of my favorite places! Pizza is great and beer selection is amazing. Dogfish 90 always on tap!!! Yes!!!!!

The service was rude and attempted to double charge on gratuity; despite having an automatic service charge of 18% for a party of 6, the waitress very generously added an additional 20% tip for herself without asking us beforehand. She also …

First of all, terrible service. Secondly, food took 45 minutes to get to our table, which is ridiculous because it was not busy and the food is literally just pasta and pizza. Thirdly, the waitress tried to add an additional tip on top of …
Great place to grab a table with friends. We started with the garlic bread and then moved on to sample most of the pizza on the menu. The meatball one was my favorite.
Great pizza and beer!
I loved my meal and my husband loves the pizza.
Amazing food
Good pizza!

Really good restaurant, could be great. Pizza dough and toppings are quite good, but the preparation left a bit to be desired. Table got multiple pizzas, one was pale and undercooked. Another had a big, dry bubble in the middle of the …

Saturday evening.  We accepted the long wait but to pay almost $20 for a 12" Buffalo chicken we expected much more than 2 pieces of chicken, and that the sauce and cheese would reach closer than 1" to the edge.  We ordered peppers and …
My sister & I enjoy it very much & the waiter was very pleasant

This was a happy accidental find, but so worth it. Almost missed the entrance since it is in the basement. The meatballs were perfect. The gravy had a nice bite to it. Highly recommend going here if you find yourself in Troy, NY.
Amazing food, but a bit on the pricey side for pizza. But worth the money for sure.
Love this place. Food is great, awesome cozy vibe, and decent wine and beer list. Feels like a special night out every time I go there.

One of my favorite restaurants in Troy, I love the garlic Alfredo sauce and being able to customize the dish with the create your own  pasta. The atmosphere is super cozy and the staff is very attentive! I'm definitely coming back soon!
Staff is great and so is the food. Nicole M was my server, she was great! Awesome food awesome service I will be back!
Good pizza, great garlic bread, decent beer selection. Service is very friendly but somewhat leisurely.
Lights were very bright upon entering and food was sub-par. I’ve been here multiple times and the atmosphere as well as the food have been inconsistent each time.
Such a cute place with amazing wood fired pizza. I’ll definitely be coming here again.
Always a nice selection of fine beers on tap and good selection of wine by the glass. Delicious wood fired pizza from the mouth of the god! Right across from the Troy Music hall.

The pizzas are good. Nice beer and wine selection. The style of pizza is thin crust which I like. I liked the salads they used to have much better than the typical mesclun mix they’ve used the last couple of times I was there. Nice beer and wine selections.
The new chef is amazing. Pesto pizza was my fave, but many other pasta dishes were top notch (yes, I tried everyones). Romes Inferno was especially good.
Great food. Nice atmosphere.
They never pick up their phone.
Fantastic pizza in a garden level restaurant. They generally have a decent beer and wine list.  One of my favorite dinner spots.
Wonderful place. Great food.  Loved the atmosphere!
Food was hot n delicious. Waittress was great
This place is great. Real laid back and was able to have a conversation with the person I came with without yelling.
Best pizza in Troy. And cozy.

Home-made wood fire pizza was great, and the pasta was excellent. For a place named after the god of wine, my girlfriend didn't have many wine options to choose from. But we both really enjoyed the food. We will be back.

Damn!! I've had a lot of pizza in upstate NY and this place takes the cake. Fun atmosphere with a ton of draft beers. But the real star is the pizza. Cooked on a wood fired grill you really get that smoky taste in the perfectly cooked thin crust. A place you have to try if you're a pizza buff.
Really nice pizza, good beer selection, not a wine drinker but seems like a nice list.
Pizza was very good. Tables very wobbly, staff not as attentive as should be

We came in Saturday and I don't think anybody noticed we had walked in. We stood at the door for maybe 5 minutes before walking around looking for a server before we were finally seated.  The staff was very nice, but the food took a really …

The service was awful! We were seated by the hostess and sat at a table in the bar area where we waited for 20 minutes and were never even acknowledged by a waitress or by one of the 3 bartenders. The woman bartender was too busy texting on …

I have tried Bacchus multiple times and I don't get the hype. I get the wood fired food but it literally always tastes burned. I think the menu is decent, maybe a bit limited. The last time I went my food was watery and cold and my waitress was awful. The beer and cider selection is good however
Great freaking place ..love the people running the joint

The pizza was delicious, although i recieved my 2nd pizza almost 20 minutes after my first pizza. We didn't mind though, we had the time and I really enjoyed sitting outside and people watching. The Soda machine was not working, so i felt like we should of been offered more water, but overall it was a really good experience. A

Great pizza!  Definitely an interesting space and a great drink list.  Bartender was also our server, was very patient with us being indecisive about our beer choices regardless.  Nice little pizza basement in Troy.
Pizza is great.  Soda system needs to be cleaned or fixed or something.  FYI, they are open Sunday.  If you do a Google search it says they are closed.  5-9 pm on Sundays
AMAZING pizza!  Everything here is great.
Good pizza and pasta dishes with a really nice atmosphere
Always a good time to go
The best pizza and service. Always good wine that is very reasonably priced.
The service was great, and welcoming. The pizza was impeccable. If I could eat it every day without gaining weight, I would.
Great pastas and lovely pizza too. Great selection of drinks
Lots of great stuff available in the store but the staff wasn't very welcoming. The events are not updated either online. Me and a friend drove all the way there for an event that was cancelled 😑
Fair prices, great beer selection, good atmosphere, good food.

Great food and a nice quiet bar at night when the rest of Troy is full of loud music and dudebros. A great atmosphere to have conversation while getting food and or drinks. Fantastic beer selection too!
Easily one of my favorite places in downtown Troy, if you're looking for a cozy pizza and pasta place, this place is great!
Great pizza and drinks
Amazing pizza. Unique looking pizza oven. Huge selection of ipas.
Good pizza, quick service, nice atmosphere
Great atmosphere in a different kind of place. Definitely recommend
Nice pizza
Quiet little bar with really good wood fired pizza.
Best wood fired pizza! Great service!
Tasty pizza, cool wood fire oven.
Great food and great service!

Very very poor service I called 40 min early to get pizza for fellow workers I get there they where just puting my pizza in so I waited even longer then  I get this 12 inch pizza that they call large me and my workers are still hungry after eating this.  Not worth it at all. .
Nice wine selection!
Great place for pizza

In a city full of good restaurants and pizza joints, Bacchus still stands out. Small, but most always awesome, beer and wine lists and the huge wood fired pizza oven alone is worth the trip. It's kind of dark and small, but reasonably kid …
Waitstaff was not attentive and lazy, but the pizza was great!! Atmosphere is cozy and nice as well.
Awesome Wood Fired Pizza... Quaint basement restaurant and pub in Troy

Horrible place to eat!!! Reason I order large pizza and they give me baby pizza whichone cost me 13.75$! And the guy who work there as bartender give me change 6.15$ from 50$ dollars which I gave to him he tr ied to cheat me for 30$!!!!
Amazing food, long wait

Best woodfired pizza I've had in the area. The menu is limited, but they do offer a make your own option so that you can get a custom pizza. They also serve pasta dishes. If your looking for healthy or low carb, this is not your place. They also have a great craft beer selection.
Best night ever  !! Food was delicious and waitress was over the top  !! Definitely returning  !!
Fun romatic atmosphere, absolutely delicious food and good wine selection. The service was terrible though. They seemed understaffed,  unaccomadating, and we felt overall unwelcomed.
Not the best Italian food. But the location is cute leaning on romantic. It does not feel like a family restaurant, but they do have coloring books for kids.
Great thin crust pizza!
Friendly service and great food, but you could tell the waitress was stressed out because the kitchen kept messing up people's orders.

Service was casual but quick and great. The bread and pizza were literally some of the best I've ever had. Atmosphere was jazzy, sexy and you feel like you're somewhere special when you're there.  Definitely coming back!

Finally after several months we made it to Bacchus pizza. We had high hopes after reading all the reviews. We ordered our drinks and pizza. The waitress could be a little friendlier, the chefs appearance could be a a little more …
good beer selection, good pizza
Satisfactory.
good pizza before seeing the symphony
Great thin crust pizza!
The personal pizza's may seem pricey but they're totally worth it!  The atmosphere here is awesome as well.
Awesome place. Always a great draught beer selection and the food is very well prepared. No televisions keeps the crowd classy too ;-)
Pasta is always good,  the Hercules is the bomb. Romes inferno as well if you're feeling dangerous.

Waited 1 hour and 15 minutes for an appetizer (garlic bread). Main courses were bland and service was not good. Waitress was sitting with her friends at the bar instead of picking up our check (we had to go find her after 15 minutes). Food was not worth the wait.
Had takeout, pretty good pie and salad

Great food. But as others have posted, they definitely need more staff at times. Everything takes just a bit too long: both food coming out and bills being paid. Not too bad as it's a good atmosphere, but noticeable at times. I'd definitely give it 5 stars if they fixed these issues.
Actually my favorite pizza. Wood-Fired and cooked the way pizza is supposed to be cooked.
Great beer selection, delicious pizza and pasta, great vibe. This place is a staple and a must visit for when friends and family come into town.
Wood Fire pizza. Good beer selection. Could use better appetizers.

The food always tastes amazing. Wood fried pizza is the real deal regardless of the toppings you choose. Service is a bit lackluster though. The wait staff is definitely friendly enough, but every time I go they seem to be understaffed, …
Good shrimp and artichoke dip appetizer. Pizza is very good and nice selection of craft beer. Terrible music choices - almost all bad covers.
Not what we like in a pizza. Skimpy on toppings. Crust is thick. Atmosphere is fine. Service was ok. Would not go back.
Great Pizza, great beer, great atmosphere.  What else is there in life??
Pizza is amazing. Service is amazing. Beer options are amazing.

Tasty, scenic, and hip italian Restaurant in downtown Troy. Students, bring your parents here! You can get a pizza and a table salad and have a great family dinner for ~$25. The pizza they serve is excellent, by the way. I can also attest that the quality of the pasta is equally good.

I love this place for dinners out with my kids or nice dates.  It has a small menu but is comfortable and unique.  The pizza is always excellent and my guests say the pasta dishes are great too.  I just wish that it was open 24/7.

The pizza is out of this world delicious. The craft beer selection is top notch. The appetizers and salads are all through the roof. The pasta is great (not that I've had it many times bc the pizza is so good) and the wine selection seems …
Excellent pizza! Usually a great experience.  However, during my past two visits I have encountered a strong smell of cigarette smoke (from the kitchen?).  Ruins an otherwise great meal.

Visited Troy for a show at the Troy Savings Bank Music Hall and stopped at this place for dinner. The food was outstanding for the price, the service was friendly even though the place was full with a lineup of people waiting and the prices …

An absolute gem embedded in a small alcove along Second Street in Troy. I was blessed to find this great little restaurant a few hours ago as I was looking for a place to eat with my family. You go down steps off of the sidewalk into a …
